thread.title: David Beckham celebrates Pancake Day in style | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: David Beckham celebrates Pancake Day in style | Daily Mail Online

author: Robert Cottingham For Mailonline
title: David Beckham celebrates Pancake Day in style | Daily Mail Online
text: 321 shares The former Manchester United star looked delighted with himself for landing the pancake He recently attended his former side's 3-2 EFL Cup win over Southampton at Wembley and posted a photo of his view while congratulating Jose Mourinho, Zlatan Ibrahimovic and the rest of the squad. But the Beckham wasn't the only sports star celebrating Shrove Tuesday. Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey posted a photo showing himself tucking into a pancake of his own. Aaron Ramsey posted this photo of himself with what he called 'his first pancake of the day' The Welshman wished his fans a happy pancake day, adding that it was only his 'first' of the day. Ramsey recently spoke out in defence of his under-pressure manager Arsene Wenger, insisting that the players should shoulder the blame for a mixed run of results. A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 28, 2017 at 2:47am PST RELATED ARTICLES
